articles.title: When, Where And How To See This Week’s Eye-Catching Close Encounter Between Mars And A Crescent Moon - Forbes
articles.description: On offer this weekend after dark is the beautiful sight of a waxing crescent Moon nestling up close to the red planet. From some parts of Africa and Asia the Moon will block Mars for about 30 minutes in a rare a "lunar occultation."
articles.content:
A crescent Moon will be visible close to Mars this weekend.
